meanings.definition: In a confident or certain manner
meanings.sent1: She walked assuredly towards the stage, ready to give her speech.
meanings.sent2: He assuredly stated that he would finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat assuredly strutted around the room, acting like the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun assuredly rises every morning, bringing light to the world.
meanings.sent5: The teacher assuredly explained the math problem, making it easy to understand.

meanings.sent1: Assuredly, the sun will rise tomorrow just like it did today.
meanings.sent2: She assuredly believed that her hard work would pay off in the end.
meanings.sent3: The magician assuredly pulled a rabbit out of his hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was assuredly like a rock, unwavering and strong.
meanings.sent5: The detective assuredly solved the case, impressing everyone with his skills.
